name: Simhamukha
description: The Simhamukha is a huge celestial creature with a majestic and imposing form, known for its magical ability and fierce combat prowess. It wields a kartika and possesses a dangerous bite that can decapitate foes.
memorable: It can deal radiant damage through its Smite ability and create frightening illusions, adding a psychological edge to its combat.
goals: The Simhamukha seeks to protect the innocent and uphold chaotic good ideals, often intervening in conflicts.
relations: This creature may be encountered alongside other celestial beings or magical creatures.
environment: The Simhamukha is typically found in areas rich in magic or near places where good forces gather.
strengths: It has a high damage output, immunity to several damage types, and advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: It can be overwhelmed by multiple foes, especially if it cannot utilize its magical defenses.
attacks: It can use a multiattack with its kartika and bite, applying radiant damage through its Smite ability.
most_powerful_ability: The Weird ability creates frightening illusions that can cause creatures to become frightened and take psychic damage.
senses: The Simhamukha possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and detect hidden foes.
skills: It has a notable proficiency in Perception, with a +6 skill modifier.
additional_information: Immunities to necrotic, poison, and radiant damage
Resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and psychic damage
Can cast magic spells at will without material components
Can create a stunning area effect with its Staff Sweep
Decapitates foes who are reduced to 0 hit points with its bite
spellcasting: The Simhamukha can cast spells like aid, guidance, and spiritual weapon at will, as well as confusion, searing smite, and thunderous smite twice per day.
test_queries: huge monster with radiant smite ability
magical being that creates frightening illusions
imposing celestial fighter with bite attack
chaotic good protector with magical weapons
